entry.title: [Pre-BIP Discussion] Bitcoin Node Repository Consensus-Policy Separation
entry.summary: The email inquiry highlights a specific interest in the influence of the bitcoin/bitcoin repository, rather than the libbitcoinkernel library. The sender acknowledges the effort behind the creation of libbitcoinkernel but wants to focus on the potential for reorganizing the bitcoin/bitcoin repo itself. They express uncertainty about whether this concern merits a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) and seek advice on the appropriate avenue to address and potentially act on their ideas regarding the repo's organization. This indicates a deeper engagement with the structure and management of the bitcoin/bitcoin repository, suggesting that the sender is looking for guidance on how to contribute to its improvement or restructuring within the broader Bitcoin development community.
